text: The Midwest Conference Men's Basketball Tournament is the annual conference basketball championship tournament for the NCAA Division III Midwest Conference. The tournament has been held annually since 1991. It is a single- elimination tournament and seeding is based on regular season records. As conference champion, the winner receives the Midwest's automatic bid to the NCAA Men's Division III Basketball Championship. ==Results== ===Finals champion only=== *Championship game results incomplete, 1991–2001 {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !Champions |- align=center | 1991 | Ripon |- align=center | 1992 | Ripon |- align=center | 1993 | Beloit |- align=center | 1994 | Cornell |- align=center | 1995 | Beloit |- align=center | 1996 | Grinnell |- align=center | 1997 | Lawrence |- align=center | 1998 | Ripon |- align=center | 1999 | Ripon |- align=center | 2000 | Ripon |- align=center | 2001 | Grinnell |} ===Full results=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !Champions !Score !Runner-Up |- align=center | 2002 | Ripon | 54–45 | St. Norbert |- align=center | 2003 | Illinois College | 101–91 | Grinnell |- align=center | 2004 | Lawrence | 82–71 | Carroll |- align=center | 2005 | Lawrence | 82–77 (2OT) | Ripon |- align=center | 2006 | Lawrence | 68–62 | Carroll |- align=center | 2007 | Carroll | 80–71 | Lake Forest |- align=center | 2008 | Lawrence | 98–95 (OT) | Carroll |- align=center | 2009 | Lawrence | 88–69 | Grinnell |- align=center | 2010 | St. Norbert | 85–74 | Carroll |- align=center | 2011 | St. Norbert | 89–67 | Grinnell |- align=center | 2012 | Carroll | 87–65 | St. Norbert |- align=center | 2013 | St. Norbert | 92–68 | Carroll |- align=center | 2014 | St. Norbert | 99–86 | Grinnell |- align=center | 2015 | St. Norbert | 91–73 | Grinnell |- align=center | 2016 | St. Norbert | 71–69 | Carroll |- align=center | 2017 | Ripon | 81–72 | Lake Forest |- align=center | 2018 | Monmouth | 79–76 | Ripon |- align=center | 2019 | Lake Forest | 68–64 | St. Norbert |- align=center | 2020 | Ripon | 84–71 | St. Norbert |} ==Championship records== *Results incomplete for 1991–2001 {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" |- !
